summary: BRAKE ROTORS HAVE BEEN REPLACED 3 TIMES FOR WARPING. DEFECTIVE HUBS AND BALL JOINTS AT 42,000 MILES. DEALER CLAIMS FROM TOWING. THIS IS A TOW VEHICLE AND NOTHING OVERSIZED HAS BEEN ATTACKED TO THE VEHICLE. DEALER HAS HONORED THE REPLACEMENT OF THE ROTORS, BUT NOT THE HUBS AND BALL JOINTS WHICH SHOULD NOT HAVE FAILED AT THIS POINT. ANY HELP WOULD BE APPRECIATED.  *JB
